message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice of the pie, but remember, if you reject this, the pie will shrink for me, and we both lose.
Alice, I appreciate your generosity, but I believe a more equitable split is in order. This offer reflects a fairer distribution of the wealth.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but this is my final offer. If you reject it, the money will continue to shrink, and we both lose more.
